steps.title: Create a Project
instructions: Enter the Project Name and Description for your project.
After filling in the details, click on Save to create the project.

steps.title: Create a Schema
instructions: Click on the project you just created.
Enter the Schema Name and click Save.

steps.title: Add Fields to the Schema
instructions: Once the schema is created, click on the schema name.
You will be directed to a page where you can add fields.

instructions.field_type: The data type (e.g., text, number, date).

instructions: After adding all necessary fields, click Save.

steps.title: Insert Data
instructions: Select the Project and Schema you want to insert data for.
A dynamic form will be generated based on the schema fields you created.
Fill in the data for each field and click Submit to save the content.

steps.title: View Dynamic URLs and API
instructions: Go to the Schema Tab to see the dynamic URLs for the schema.
Copy the Dynamic URL for use in your frontend.
You can also copy the API Key for the project from the API Tab.
